Text: "Crazy Love" is a 1979 hit single for the country rock group Poco introduced on the 1978 album "Legend"; written by founding group member Rusty Young, "Crazy Love" was the first single by Poco to reach the Top 40 and remained the group's biggest hit with especial impact as an Adult Contemporary hit being ranked by "Billboard" as the #1 Adult Contemporary hit for the year 1979.
